results.title: They Are Also 2 Wild and Crazy Guys
results.abstract: Steve Martin wanted to make cartoons, but he can only draw stick figures. He teamed up with the illustrator Harry Bliss, and the result is their new book, “A Wealth of Pigeons.”

results.title: Go Ahead, Binge Old Movies and Jam Out to ’90s Hits
results.abstract: Decades-old movies, songs and video games have surged in popularity over the pandemic. Psychologists say conjuring nostalgia during stressful times is a healthy coping mechanism.

results.title: Gigi Proietti, Actor Who Embodied the Roman Spirit, Dies at 80
results.abstract: Beloved in Italy, he was best known as the star of a TV series playing a small-town police chief. He also had a long film career and a popular one-man stage show.
